instruction: Provide a valid example of using inheritance in the Java language
output: An example of using inheritance in Java is by extending a class. For example, if you have a class called “Car”, you can create a new class called “SportCar” and extend the “Car” class. This would give “SportCar” all the same features and methods as “Car”, while allowing you to add new features and methods that are specific to “SportCar”.
